yourStory: This was my first solo trip to Cartagena Colombia 👩🏻‍🦰,a city full of memories to cherish forever and forever.
🏝️ Paradise Found in Phuket. From turquoise tides to golden sunsets — every moment is a postcard.
Where Even Statues Throw Shade 😎 Danced with strangers, got sunburnt, and almost joined a samba band. Lost my flip-flops but found my rhythm!. 😂🌴💃
Where clouds kiss the hills and waterfalls whisper secrets. Nature’s symphony plays loud in every raindrop and smile.🌧️⛰️💚
